title: Audra McDonald Racks Up The Tonys, This Time As Billie Holiday
teaser: Audra McDonald just won her sixth Tony, the most wins by anyone to date. McDonald is a Broadway staple, and she earned her latest Tony playing Billie Holiday in Lady Day at Emerson's Bar and Grill.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
